knownTech.name: HTML
knownTech.desc: I used HTML in all projects to build the layout of all apps, where I start the project from scratch, add HTML elemnts, meta tags for responsive designs along with main titles. I HTML to build pages with a component that reflect the main functionality to be a web application using the html events to trigger different functionality according to user actions.

knownTech.name: CSS 3
knownTech.desc: I used CSS to add all styles for the HTML elements in all projects, either inline, interal or external files. I am always responsible for adding the styles and fixing all UI issues on all browsers.

knownTech.name: SASS
knownTech.desc: I used SASS in all new projects using React, angular or vue. Adding styles, variables, mixins, nesting, inheritance and operators. I made themeing using SASS in an angular project.

newTech.name: React
newTech.desc: I created React projects from scratch, build the components and linking them together, used routing and state management that helps sharing props accross different components.

newTech.name: Typescript
newTech.desc: I used Typescript that apply the object oriented programming concept in all new react projects.

newTech.name: Javascript
newTech.desc: I used Javascript to make the Dom elements function with a proper way. I used javascript along ago with jquery in toggling classes and adding basic functionality for components.

newTech.name: Github
newTech.desc: I used Github as a versioning source control. I added all my private projects on github, added collaborators and made projects public. Created branches for defining project into managed milestones along with descriptive comments.

newTech.name: Figma
newTech.desc: I used Figma to design the look and feel for the application. I learned to add layers, react components, frames and draw icons. I learned also to extract icons and import images. I applied that on both mobile and desktop designs.

newTech.name: Firebase
newTech.desc: I used Firebase to deploy projects on cloud. I learned how to install, initialize, build and deploy projects.
